key.name: hot-corner
key.summary: Keep hot corner sensitive or not
key.description: Set to "true" to keep hot corner sensitive even when panel is in hidden state. Set to "false" to get rid of the hot corner in hidden state.

key.name: mouse-sensitive
key.summary: Show panel when mouse approaches edge of the screen
key.description: Set to "true" to show panel not only in overview but also when the mouse approaches the edge of the screen.

key.name: use-pressure-barrier
key.description: Set to "true" to force using a pressure barrier instead of a simple enter event (only for GNOME 3.8 and up).

key.name: mouse-triggers-overview
key.summary: Show overview when mouse approaches edge of the screen
key.description: When "mouse-sensitive" is set to "true" and this key is activated, not only the panel but also the overview is shown when the mouse approaches the edge of the screen.

key.name: animation-time-overview
key.description: The time it takes for the tweener to slide the panel in/out when entering/leaving overview.

key.name: animation-time-autohide
key.description: The time it takes for the tweener to slide the panel in/out when the mouse approaches the edge of the screen.
